nuts.name: Jumbo Cashews
nuts.review: Tastey, but for some reason they're higher in fat than most candy of the same dimensions...

nuts.name: BBQ Almonds
nuts.review: These almonds suck. As in, the only good part about them is sucking off the bbq dust exterior

soda.name: Mountain Dew
soda.review: Tastey, but pouring it into a glass reveals an unsettling color

soda.name: Coke
soda.review: Hate your teeth? Need to clean a car battery? Try this!
